name: Dan-Gun
meaning: Dan Gun is named after the holy Dan Gun, the legindary founder of Korea in the year 2333 B.C.

moves.title: parallel ready stance
moves.description: Start position.

moves.title: l-stance guarding block
moves.description: Turn 90° left into right L-stance with middle section knifehand guarding block.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance with high section forefist punch.

moves.title: l-stance guarding block
moves.description: Pivot 180° clockwise into left L-stance with knifehand guarding block.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance with high section forefist punch.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Turn 90° left into left walking stance with low outer forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance with high section forefist punch.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance with high section forefist punch.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance with high section forefist punch.

moves.title: l-stance block
moves.description: Pivot 270° anti-clockwise into right L-stance with twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance with high section punch.

moves.title: l-stance block
moves.description: Pivot 180° clockwise into left L-stance with twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance with high section punch.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Turn 90° left into left walking stance with low outer forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: On the spot in left walking stance with rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance with rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance with rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance with rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: l-stance knife-hand strike
moves.description: Pivot 270° anti-clockwise into right L-stance with knifehand side strike.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance with high section forefist punch.

moves.title: l-stance knife-hand strike
moves.description: Pivot 180° clockwise into left L-stance with knifehand side strike.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance with high section punch.

moves.title: parallel ready stance
moves.description: Bring the left foot back to ready posture.
